name: Out Dodging Boxes
description:
Welcome to Out Dodging Boxes. The premise is simple: Collect the gold and get out and dodge everything else also it can induce a slight bit of rage.... like a lot.  See the screen get insane as boxes fly every which way and try to discern the chaos. With loads of different enemy types and randomly selected set of levels Out Dodging boxes is sure to keep you on your toes.

*Note Requires Java To Be Installed!
